Attribute.Name: AverageCost
Attribute.Description: Average Cost of the item at the ship node.

Attribute.Name: CostCurrency
Attribute.Description: Currency in which inventory cost is maintained.

Attribute.Name: InventoryValue
Attribute.Description: Total value of the current ohn-hand inventory for item at the shipnode.

Attribute.Name: OrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Organization Code of the organization maintaining the inventory.

Attribute.Name: Quantity
Attribute.Description: Current on-hand inventory for the item at the ship node.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: Ship Node for which inventory item cost is maintained.

Attribute.Name: UnitCost
Attribute.Description: Standard Cost of the inventory item at the ship node. If the base cost is based on Replacement Cost, then this attribute will not be returned since it is not applicable.
